sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_gamification_criteria"> <u_gamification_criteria action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <sys_created_by>admin.suganya</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-16 09:44:47</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0df8dd3bdb05230008d749ee3b9619f2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin.suganya</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-11-09 10:08:27</sys_updated_on> <u_active>true</u_active> <u_criteria_name>Resolution Time</u_criteria_name> <u_description>Gamification Admin can provide points for Resolution time based on the Threshold and the incident's Resolve time in hours.</u_description> <u_expected>2</u_expected> <u_points>5</u_points> <u_threshold>48</u_threshold> </u_gamification_criteria> </record_update>
